intro: Farsetia spinulosa, commonly known as the spiny farsetia, is a flowering plant native to southern Africa. It belongs to the family Aizoaceae, commonly referred to as the ice plant family. Due to its unique appearance and resilience, it is often cultivated as an ornamental plant in dry gardens.
